Report Abuse I sincerely hope the Egyptian people eventually will win their freedom. However, the Cairo museum is one of the world's greatest museums. It's artifacts are beyond price. They are the cultural heritage of the Egyptian people representing one of the world's earliest and greatest civilizations. It would be a tragedy for Egypt and it's people if the Cairo Museum were looted and trashed like the Bagdad Museum. Report Abuse " Headline:`` Egypt's museums and monuments are deserted'' "

the Internet giant. SCHMIDT SELLS SHARES In a regulatory filing last week, Google said that Eric Schmidt in December drew up a plan to sell some of his stock in the company. The pre-arranged trading plan was adopted in order to allow Eric Schmidt to sell a portion of his Google stock as part of his long-term strategy for individual asset diversification and liquidity, the filing said. As of December 31, Eric Schmidt had about 9.2 million shares of Google stock and controlled 9.6% of the company's voting power. Eric Schmidt plans to sell about 534,000 shares of Class

who has led Google for a decade, will become executive chairman focusing on external relations, deals and government relations.New Yorker writer Ken Auletta , who has written a book on the company, reported Friday that Eric Schmidt had been nudged aside.`` Ken Auletta said that after losing out to Page and co-founder Sergey Brin over the company's China policy a year ago,`` Eric Schmidt lost some energy and focus.`` Eric Schmidt was also criticized for allowing Google to be overtaken by Facebook, for the company's increasingly frequent privacy scandals and its increasing internal bureaucracy.
